data.name: Brain Spa
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Brain Spa, a place where you can learn to maximize your memory, improve your perception abilities, power up your language aptitude, and fine tune your logical thinking skills!

  • 8 different mini-games to play emphasizing four distinct categories of mental abilities: Memory, Perception, Logic, Language.
  • A fun and practical way to exercise your brain and stimulate mental fitness.
  • Internal time tracking allows you to see your best scores and track your progress over time and also compare results with other players.
  • Colorful calendars and graphs make it easy to view your progress.
  • Dynamic leveling system allows the game to customize the difficulty based on your skill.
  • Daily tests can assess your overall Brain Power.

data.short_description: Welcome to the Brain Spa, a place where you can learn to maximize your memory, improve your perception abilities, power up your language aptitude, and fine tune your logical thinking skills! 8 different mini-games to play emphasizing four distinct categories of mental abilities: Memory, Perception, Logic, Language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• Supported OS: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista (only)
  • Processor: 500 MHz Pentium III or AMD K6 III or better (1 GHz Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon recommended)
  • System Memory: 128 MB (256 MB required for Vista and XP)
  • Video Card: 32 MB DirectX 7-compliant video card (64 MB recommended) (see supported list*)
  • Sound Card: DirectX 7-compliant sound card
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 7 or higher (included)
  • Hard Disk: 70 MB free
  • Peripherals Supported: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

*Supported Video Cards:
NVIDIA GeForce 2 / 3 / 4 / FX / 6 / 7 / 8 families
ATI Radeon 7 / 8 / 9 / X families
Matrox Parhelia
Intel i815 / i915 / i945
Laptop versions of these cards are not fully supported.
